steps.title: Landing on invoify.vercel.app
details: Every scenario successfully opened the homepage. Good first impression: fast load, logo & primary CTA visible.

steps.title: Trying to start Invoice Wizard – Step 1 (Bill From / Bill To)
details: Both ‘Bill From :’ and ‘Bill To :’ headers never became visible → tests timed-out.
User cannot move forward, so all downstream validation, persistence, and navigation checks were skipped.

steps.title: Template gallery & logo upload
details: Header inside landing page ('BETA English Toggle theme') did not render, so template list wasn’t reached.
Logo-upload control could not be found.

steps.title: Live preview (basic fill works, dynamic update fails)
details: User managed to fill both Bill-From & Bill-To forms and saw data appear in preview (pass).
Updating values later did NOT refresh preview (fail).

steps.title: Wizard-step synchronisation with preview
details: Wizard navigation button ‘1 . From & To’ never responded → preview sync never evaluated.

steps.title: Signature features (draw / type / upload)
details: Canvas for drawing signature, typed-signature area, and image-upload zone were all missing or hidden.

steps.title: Financial calculations (Line Items, Tax, Discount, Shipping)
details: ‘Line Items’ section, ‘Tax Calculation’ block, and subtotal fields were not found, so no calculations could be tested.

steps.title: Global visual QA observations
details: Automated UI review flagged repeated cosmetic issues: inconsistent padding & margins, mis-aligned labels, varying button styles, weak placeholder copy.

emotional_arc: Hopeful on first page load → confusion when expected sections never appear → repeated frustration/timeouts → brief relief when live preview initially works → disappointment when dynamic updates break → overall loss of confidence, likely abandonment.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Critical content not rendered / discoverability of key sections
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Users cannot progress or even see core functionality (Bill From/To, Line Items, Tax, Signatures). Blocks conversion entirely.
next_actions: Audit React/component mounting logic and conditional rendering—ensure sections are inserted into DOM on first load.
Add loading skeletons or status indicators so users know content is coming.
Set explicit heights/anchors so off-screen sections can be scrolled to and discovered.
Add automated smoke test to fail CI when headers are missing.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Inability to jump between steps or persist data makes multi-step flow feel brittle and forces restart.
next_actions: Keep step buttons always enabled/visible; disable only with clear explanation.
Store step data in global form state (e.g., context) and restore on return.
Highlight current step in UI to orient the user.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Live preview is the product’s ‘magic moment’. Lag or failure erodes trust and causes manual re-checks.
next_actions: Debounce input updates but ensure one-way data flow to preview; add unit tests on key fields.
Provide subtle loading indicator inside preview when update is in progress.
Log to console when binding fails to aid debugging.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Branding & sign-off are legally required for invoices; if users can’t find these, they will churn.
next_actions: Surface these actions in dedicated ‘Branding’ section; use universally recognised icons (pen, image upload).
Add placeholder guidance text like “Drag or click to add your signature”.
Support JPG/PNG/SVG & give immediate feedback on invalid files.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Small visual polish signals professionalism and reduces cognitive load.
next_actions: Adopt a spacing scale (4-pt or 8-pt) and apply via design tokens.
Run a CSS linter or style-lint for button component variations.
Align labels with inputs using flex/grid; test responsive breakpoints.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Informative placeholders accelerate form filling and reduce errors.
next_actions: Replace lorem/weak copy with concrete examples (‘e.g. Acme Corp’) and formatting hints (‘+1 (555) 123-4567’).
Proof-read for spelling & case consistency.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Current timeouts feel like the app froze. Human-friendly messages keep users engaged.
next_actions: Display inline errors when a section fails to load (e.g., “Can’t find Line Items, retry?”).
Offer retry/refresh CTA instead of silent failure.

first_tackles.description: Ensure ‘Bill From’, ‘Bill To’, ‘Line Items’, ‘Tax’ headers render on initial load (fix conditional rendering & provide fallback).
Wire real-time preview to always update on field change; add unit test coverage for data-binding.
Introduce a global spacing & button style guide; update CSS variables to eliminate padding/alignment inconsistencies.
Add clear, descriptive placeholders & helper text to all inputs for faster onboarding.
Make signature/logo upload controls always visible with clear icons and drag-and-drop support.
